actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to improve retirement counseling for Federal Government employees.

summary.text: Requires the Director of the Office of Personnel Management (OPM) to: (1) establish a training program for all Federal agency retirement counselors to fully promote informed retirement decisions by Federal employees; and (2) designate and publicize a telephone number at OPM which annuitants may call to obtain answers to questions relating to retirement benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to improve retirement counseling for Federal Government employees.
